# ads2.bid

Provides support for [ads2.bid](https://ads2.bid/) widgets.

### Required parameters

-   `data-a2b-src`
-   `data-a2b-user-id`
-   `data-a2b-site-id`

## Example

```html
<amp-ad layout="responsive"
        width="320"
        height="500"
        type="ads2bid"
        data-a2b-site-id="11620"
        data-a2b-block-id="36272"
        data-a2b-src="https://web.adsbid-stage.techhprof.ru/script.js?amp=1">
</amp-ad>
```
